ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( ISPICKVAL( Is_this_a_PEO_Client__c,"Yes"), OR( ISPICKVAL( PEO_Calendar_Lost_Month__c,""), ISPICKVAL( PEO_Fiscal_Year__c ,"") ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: PEO Calendar Lost Month and PEO Fiscal Year are required if Is it a PEO client is selected as Yes
